input.description: adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter that is enabled on the Peer. The default adapter name is HPSEActor

1. Find all accesspoints. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>domaindiscovery</category> <process-id>find-discovery-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <accesspoint> <all/> </accesspoint> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. accesspoint[Required] Indicates that an entry of type accesspoint is being searched here. all[Required] Indicates that find the list of all the accesspoints.
2. Find all domaincontroller information. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>domaindiscovery</category> <process-id>find-discovery-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <application> <domainControllerinfo/> </application> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. application[Required] Indicates that an entry of type application is being searched here. domainControllerinfo[Required] Indicates that find the list of all the domainControllers.
3. Find all database information. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>domaindiscovery</category> <process-id>find-discovery-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <application> <databaseinfo/> </application> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. application[Required] Indicates that an entry of type application is being searched here. databaseinfo[Required] Indicates that find the list of all the databases.
4. Find all TnsListener port information. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>domaindiscovery</category> <process-id>find-discovery-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <application> <tnslistenerport/> </application> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. application[Required] Indicates that an entry of type application is being searched here. tnslistenerport[Required] Indicates that find the list of all the tnslistenerports.
5. Find all Credentials. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>domaindiscovery</category> <process-id>find-discovery-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <credentials/> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. credentials[Required] Indicates that find the list of all the credentials.
6. Find all Discovery Groups. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>domaindiscovery</category> <process-id>find-discovery-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <discoverygroup> <all/> </discoverygroup> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. discoverygroup[Required] Indicates that details of discoverygroup are required. all[Required] Indicates that all details are required.
